channel.title: The Lightbox - Animation News
channel.description: Updates on the happenings in the animation industry, including news and personal opinions, with special attention to feature animation.

item.title: Wired News on Oscar Animation category
item.description: Wired News reports on the new Feature Animation category for the upcoming Oscars. The nominees will be announced Tomorrow (Feb 12).

item.title: Lilo and Stitch trailer
item.description: Teaser trailer for Disney's upcoming "Lilo and Stitch" is available. The film opens June 2002, as usual.

item.title: Jerry Beck reviews "Art of Monsters" book
item.description: A glowing review of the inspirational artwork behind the recent Pixar film. Worth owning, but I was disappointed by the lack of textual content and passed this one up. [buy]

item.title: Happy Birthday, Walt
item.description: Walt Disney would have been 100 today. If only he had lived to see what his creations have become... (Above audio link requires RealAudio.)
